<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get User Wallet"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/me/wallets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the _authenticated user_ wallets. Successful request will return a single [Wallet Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/wallet-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game_id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the parent game. _*Not required when g-url is used._","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":"1"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
